mcq.statement: FIA was constituted as an Agency to conduct inquiry into and investigate the offences specified in:

options.a: Pakistan Penal code( XLV) of 1860 in respect of criminal offence but not for cases of civil nature
options.b: Crimes cognizable in  violation of the law of the land or those in contravention of a jirga agreement
options.c: The Schedule including an attempt or conspiracy to commit
